DOMDocument inherits all the properties and methods from [Gecko.DOMNode DOMNode].

==Methods==

|| *Name* || *Description* ||
|| [Gecko.GetElementByID GetElementByID] || Gets an element from the document by its ID attribute ||
|| [Gecko.CreateTextNode CreateTextNode] || Creates a new text node and returns it as a [Gecko.DOMNode DOMNode] object. ||
|| [Gecko.CreateElement CreateElement] || Creates a new element node and returns it as a [Gecko.DOMNode DOMNode] object. ||

==Properties==

|| *Name* || *Type* || *Description* ||
|| documentElement | [Gecko.DOMNode DOMNode] || Allows access to the document element that is at the top of the DOM tree. ||
